SEARCH
Package Service

Class BookServiceCustomer

java.lang.Object
Service.BookService
Service.BookServiceCustomer
public class BookServiceCustomer extends BookService
Service class for managing customer operations related to borrowing, returning, and viewing loans for books and CDs. It also manages the user's waitlist and loan reports.

  • Constructor Summary

    • borrowMediaItem

      public boolean borrowMediaItem(String isbn)
      Borrows a media item (book or CD) identified by ISBN.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN of the media item to borrow.
      Returns:
      true if the borrowing is successful, false otherwise.

    • returnBook

      public boolean returnBook(String loanId)
      Returns a borrowed item based on the loan ID.
      Parameters:
      loanId - the Loan ID for the borrowed item.
      Returns:
      true if the item is successfully returned, false otherwise.

    • completeReturn

      public boolean completeReturn(String loanId)
      Completes the return of a borrowed item and handles overdue fines.
      Parameters:
      loanId - the Loan ID for the borrowed item.
      Returns:
      true if the return is completed successfully, false otherwise.

    • viewMyLoans

      public MediaItem findMediaByIsbn(String isbn)
      Finds a media item (book or CD) by its ISBN.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      public String generateLoanReport()

    • getCopiesByISBN

      Retrieves the list of copies of a media item by its ISBN.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN of the media item.
      Returns:
      the list of MediaCopy objects for the given ISBN.
